properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Okka yaathmanainaa nenu rakshimpaka Yesuvaa Vatti chetulato ninnu darsinchuta thagunaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Odducheri nee yeduta nilchu napdu rakshakaa Okka yaathmanaina leka siggupadi podunaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aatmaalandu vaanchchaleka somarulai kaalamun Vyardaparchu vaarannaata chintatoda nilturu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesuva na swarakshana nischayambu ainade Anina phalitambu chooda kashtapadaka pothine{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kalamella gadchipoyen mosapoti nenayyaa gadchinatti Kalamaithe edchinanu vachchunaa ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Baktulaaraa dhairyamutho lechi prakaashinchudi Aathmalella Yesu nodda cherunatlu cheyudi{/lang-eng}
